text: The following is a list of notable deaths in January 2015. For notable deaths before the current month, please see "Previous months". *Name, age, country of citizenship and reason for notability, cause of death, reference (must be added) are added. __TOC__ ==January 2015== * January 1 - Mario Cuomo, 82, American politician, Governor of New York (1983–1994), heart failure.Mario Cuomo, former New York governor, dead at 82 * January 1 - Staryl C. Austin, 94, American air force brigadier general.Staryl Austin Obituary * January 1 - Omar Karami, 80, Lebanese politician, Prime Minister (1990–1992, 2004–2005). * January 1 - Ulrich Beck, 70, German sociologist, heart attack.Ulrich Beck gestorben * January 1 - Jeff Golub, 59, American guitarist, progressive supranuclear palsy.Guitarist Jeff Golub Dies at 59 * January 1 - Boris Morukov, 64, Russian physician and cosmonaut.Скончался руководитель эксперимента "Марс-500" Борис Моруков * January 1 - Ninón Sevilla, 93, Mexican actress (Aventurera), heart attack. * January 1 - Donna Douglas, 82, American actress (The Beverly Hillbillies, Frankie and Johnny, The Twilight Zone), pancreatic cancer.'Beverly Hillbillies' star Donna Douglas dies at 82 * January 1 - Eric Cunningham, 65, Canadian politician, Ontario MPP for Wentworth North (1975–1984). * January 1 - Mrunalini Devi Puar, 83, Indian educator, Chancellor of the Maharaja Sayajirao University of Baroda (since 1988).Mrunalini Devi Puar, Chancellor of M S University of Baroda, passes away * January 1 - Miller Williams, 84, American poet, Alzheimer's disease.Poet Miller Williams, 84, dies * January 1 - Géry Leuliet, 104, French Roman Catholic prelate, Bishop of Amiens (1963–1985).Bishop Géry-Jacques-Charles Leuliet * January 2 - Lam Po-chuen, 63, Hong Kong dubbing artist (Doraemon), diabetes.Dubbing artist dies at age 63 * January 2 - Arthur A.
